changePassword.title: Change password
changePassword.passwordMin8Error: Password must be at least 8 characters long
changePassword.sameAsPreviousError: Password is the same as the previous one

registration.signInHintPrefix: If you have flown with us before,
registration.signInHintSuffix: to reuse data from previous years.
registration.passwordMin8Error: Password must be at least 8 characters long
registration.fillMainLoggerFirst: Fill in the primary logger first, then the backup one.

guides.intro: Short guides for sign in, password reset and entry editing. Most links redirect you to the relevant app page. If anything is missing in help or not working, contact us at
guides.noResultsPrefix: No results found. Try another keyword (for example: password, reset, edit). Or write to

login.title: Sign in
login.i2: Enter your email and password, then click “Sign in”.

edit.title: Entry editing
edit.i1: After signing in, the “Entry edit” item appears in the menu.
edit.i2: Click it, update your data and save changes.
edit.i3a: The edit page is also available via

forgot.title: Forgot password (send link)
forgot.i2: Enter your email and click “Send link”.
forgot.i3: You will receive an email with a password reset link.

reset.title: Password reset (set a new password)
reset.i1: Open the link from your email (it leads to the “Set password” page).
reset.i2: Enter a new password (min. 8 characters) and confirm it in the second field.
reset.i3a: Click “Set new password”. Then return to
reset.i3b: and sign in with the new password.

change.title: Change password after sign in
change.i1a: After signing in, open the user menu and select “Change password”, or go directly to

issues.title: Common issues (quick check)
issues.i2: New password must be at least 8 characters and both fields must match.
issues.i3: Use the latest reset email link (older links may be invalid).

cookieConsent.title: Cookies
cookieConsent.text: We use necessary cookies for website functionality (e.g. sign in). Optional analytics/marketing cookies are not currently used. If added in the future, you will be able to allow them here.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookies
cookiePolicy.summaryPrefix: This website uses necessary cookies required for functionality (e.g. sign in and session persistence). Optional cookies (e.g. analytics or marketing) are currently not used. If we add them in the future, you will be able to allow/reject them in the cookie bar. If you have any questions, contact us at
cookiePolicy.usedTitle: Necessary cookies used by this website
cookiePolicy.usedIntro: These cookies are required for sign in and account usage:
cookiePolicy.tokenDesc: authentication token (keeps session after sign in).
